text: Vito Pallavicini (22 April 1924 - 16 August 2007) was an Italian lyricist. Born in Vigevano, he wrote numerous songs, during his career for Adriano Celentano (Azzurro), Caterina Caselli (Insieme a te non ci sto più) and many others.
